Daniel



He is eight weeks old. On the same trip, we also saw a three-week-old baby, Ian Matheson, but didn't take any pictures of him.
Taken Sunday, December 23, 2001, 03:56:09pm.  Original image size: 1200x1600, 845kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/25s @ F3.5, ISO 400, 171mm
